entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
